page.title: 06Parking in Dedham
page.content: A particular problem in Dedham today is parking which is very difficult because tourists come and park in the High Street and in front of other peoples houses and driveways. Dedham has no parking area.The village police man puts bollards up and down the street by the Dedham Centre.Dedham is having a car park built in Pig Meadow. A lot of people have trouble even getting to the shops in the High Street. It is even worse on a Saturday and Sunday.The Afternoons from midday to tea time are the most crowded times but the Marlborough and Sun Inn have quite a lot of cars in the evenings also.
